wikitext.*:
{{album | image = The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition.jpg | title=''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack'' | type=Soundtrack | artist=[[Howard Shore]] | released=[[11 December]], [[2012]] | recorded= | genre= | length= | language=English | label=[[Wikipedia:WaterTower Music|WaterTower Music]] }} '''''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[11 December]] [[2012]].{{webcite|author=[[Doug Adams]]|articleurl=http://www.musicoflotr.com/2012/11/the-hobbit-unexpected-journey.html|articlename=The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey Soundtrack Album Coming December 11|dated=1-November-2012|website=[http://www.musicoflotr.com Doug Adam's Blog]|accessed=1-November-2012}} ==Contents== ===Disc 1=== # [[My Dear Frodo]] (8:03) # [[Old Friends]] (extended version) (5:01) # [[An Unexpected Party (soundtrack)|An Unexpected Party]] (extended version) (4:09) # [[Blunt the Knives]] - performed by the Dwarf Cast (1:01) # [[Axe or Sword?]] (5:59) # [[Misty Mountains (soundtrack)|Misty Mountains]] - performed by [[Richard Armitage]] and the Dwarf Cast (1:42) # [[The Adventure Begins]] (2:05) # [[The World is Ahead]] (2:20) # [[An Ancient Enemy]] (4:57) # [[Radagast the Brown (soundtrack)|Radagast the Brown]] (extended version) (6:39) # [[The Trollshaws (soundtrack)|The Trollshaws]] (2:09) # [[Roast Mutton (soundtrack)|Roast Mutton]] (extended version) (4:57) # [[A Troll-hoard]] (2:39) # [[The Hill of Sorcery]] (3:51) # [[Warg-Scouts]] (3:02) ===Disc 2=== # [[The Hidden Valley]] (3:49) # [[Moon Runes (soundtrack)|Moon Runes]] (extended version) (3:39) # [[The Defiler]] (1:14) # [[The White Council (soundtrack)|The White Council]] (extended version) (9:41) # [[Over Hill]] (3:44) # [[A Thunder Battle]] (3:55) # [[Under Hill]] (1:55) # [[Riddles in the Dark (soundtrack)|Riddles in the Dark]] (5:21) # [[Brass Buttons]] (7:38) # [[Out of the Frying-Pan]] (5:55) # [[A Good Omen]] (5:47) # [[Song of the Lonely Mountain]] (extended version) - performed by [[Neil Finn]] (6:01) # [[Dreaming of Bag End]] (1:47) ====Exclusive bonus tracks====
  1. [[A Very Respectable Hobbit]] (1:22)
  2. [[Erebor (soundtrack)|Erebor]] (1:19)
  3. [[The Dwarf Lords]] (2:01)
  4. [[The Edge of the Wild (soundtrack)|The Edge of the Wild]] (3:34)
